name: In the Mix: Featuring Armin van Buuren
name_original: In the Mix: Featuring Armin van Buuren
description:
In the Mix: Featuring Armin van Buuren is an arcade game developed by TransGaming Studio. It came out on 21-08-2010. It was published by Foreign Media Games.
You can play In the Mix: Featuring Armin van Buuren on Wii.
